mapper.insert:
select story_comments_seq.nextval from dual
insert into story_comments(cno,write_date,writer,content,profile,storyno,username) values(#{cno},#{writeDate},#{writer},#{content},#{profile},#{storyno},#{username})
mapper.select: select cno,write_date,writer,content,ptofile,storyno,username from story_comments where cno=#{cno} order cno by desc
mapper.delete: delete from story_comments where cno=#{cno} and rownum=1
